title: Exeed Named 'Most Innovative TreasuryVision User in Middle East' at Citi's Client Excellence Awards
summary: Abu Dhabi, UAE – Exeed Industries, a privately held Abu Dhabi-based diversified industrial investment holding company, was named 'Most Innovative TreasuryVision User in the Middle East' at Citi's Client Excellence Awards.
tag-1: Exeed Named 'Most Innovative TreasuryVision User in Middle East' at Citi's Client Excellence Awards
tag-3: Abu Dhabi, UAE – Exeed Industries, a privately held Abu Dhabi-based diversified industrial investment holding company, was named 'Most Innovative TreasuryVision User in the Middle East' at Citi's Client Excellence Awards.
tag-4: Presented annually, the awards are based on rigorous industry metrics and designed to acknowledge existing clients for their achievements in various banking transactional categories.
tag-5: Exeed Industries was acknowledged for optimizing its use of TreasuryVision, a unique web-based service that increases visibility and control for organizations to view their overall positions and forecasts and more effectively manage global liquidity and risk across the enterprise.
tag-6: Eyad Al Ramlawi, Chief Financial Officer, Exeed Industries, said: "Our challenge was visibility into and control of the information and processes around our bank accounts' liquidity.
tag-7: "Citi's TreasuryVision has provided us with a customized view of our financial information in a holistic way. It is a quality-driven service that connects our bank accounts. The global information on investments, debt and the cash it provides immensely improves financial controls."
tag-8: Citi provided Exeed Industries with an entire spectrum of cash management solutions, including operating accounts, TreasuryVision, payments integration with CitiDirect and a comprehensive liquidity management structure.
tag-9: Steve Donovan, Managing Director and Head, Global Transaction Services, Middle East and Pakistan at Citi, said, "TreasuryVision works towards making liquid reserves easily accessible, especially at diverse corporations with active cash flow operations. Exceed has made remarkable use of the customized information provided by TreasuryVision, and has utilized its capabilities in order to optimize its liquidity position, hence Citi's recognition."
tag-10: Exeed is a diversified and specialized manufacturing investment company consisting of several business units spanning petrochemicals, metal, agro, infrastructure, building materials and private equity investments. It has lent its support to four business units and 17 companies in the MENA region across various sectors.
tag-11: EXEED Industries EXEED Industries is the industrial arm of National Holding, a privately held Abu Dhabi-based diversified holding company. EXEED follows a strategic framework of evaluating business development opportunities with the ambition of establishing anchor industries through key partnerships with pioneering entities. Currently, the company has diversified and specialized manufacturing investments in various growth sectors in the UAE& MENA region through 16 entities spanning building materials, cables, fibers, agro, and international investments.
tag-12: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
